name: Dungeon Soul
description:
Dungeon soul is a top-down tower defense with action aspects.

Between each waves of heroes, you have to create and upgrade your dungeon.
If heroes kill the heart of the dungeon you lose, if they are all killed by you or the monsters you can go to the next wave.

* This game has been made for a 1 week school project, some bugs may occurs. *

Controls:

- W A S D: move camera and player
- Q E: rotate room when moving it in build mode
- 1 2: transform the dungeon soul into dragon or orc when in play mode
- Left click: Attack nearby heroes when controlling the dungeon soul in play mode
- Escape: Close UI, unselect room, or pause the game

Features:

- Place and merge rooms on your dungeon
- Buy rooms and room upgrades
- Control the dungeon soul to help the monsters to kill heroes
